DOC.brief_summary: The study aim investigate effect pre-anesthetic education patient undergoing cardiac surgery
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Pre-anesthetic Education Cardiac Surgery Patients ' Anxiety Level
DOC.detailed_description: Approval Ethical Committee Faculty Medicine University Indonesia acquire prior conduct study . Subjects give informed consent enrol study . Subjects identification do use identification form , medical record , Mini Mental State Evaluation ( MMSE ) Internal Classification Diseases ( ICD ) 10 . Subjects ' anxiety level measure use Amsterdam Preoperative Anxiety Information Scale ( APAIS ) help researcher explain question . Then , education give subject , guide flow chart make researcher , use verbal emphatic non-verbal language . If education subject get anxious without cardiovascular emergency , education would stop , subject would ease . Subject 's family would call . If subject agree continue , study would carry , otherwise subject drop . Benzodiazepin midazolam 0.5 mg/kgBW would consider consulted psychiatrist . On day education discussion , subject fill APAIS enter operation room . APAIS score record anesthesia would present mean , analyze SPSS use pair T-test ( Wilcoxon test alternative test ) .
DOC.criteria: Subjects age 1865 year old Subjects able read write properly Subjects adequate communication ability Subjects able speak Indonesian language properly Subjects plan undergo cardiac surgery Subjects give informed consent anesthetical surgical procedure . Subjects give inform consent Subjects do cardiac surgery study commence , Subjects cognitive/psychiatric problem decrease communication ability Subjects antianxiety and/or antidepressant treatment . Drop criterion : Subjects anxiety sign symptom with/without cardiovascular alarming sign could ease education Subjects decide drop study .
